data.title: Shahrzad Javid on LinkedIn: #derbyeveryday #kentuckyderbymuseum #derbyseason #kentuckyderby #fundraiser
data.meta_description: The Kentucky Derby Museum Ball was another fabulous evening working alongside the absolute best team, surrounded by our incredible supporters & friends. The…
data.text:
I’m thrilled to announce that KDM is on the lookout for a driven and enthusiastic Human Resources Generalist to join our HR team. This is a fantastic entry-level position that offers a wonderful opportunity to kick start a career in Human Resources! If you or someone you know is eager to embrace this opportunity and make a significant impact in a vibrant work environment, we’d love to hear from you. Please don’t hesitate to send your referrals my way. Let’s help someone embark on their HR journey together! https://lnkd.in/eX5aHNZs

We're excited to share that KDM's Director of Communications has been named one of the Louisville Business First 20 People to Know in advertising, PR and marketing. Congratulations, Katrina Helmer! Your strategic planning and storytelling are constant reminders of your dedication to furthering our mission. Check out Katrina's Q&A here: https://bit.ly/4cDrILn

Allow us to reintroduce ourselves! KDM’s Communications Team is already gearing up for next year’s Derby. Katrina Helmer, Director of Communications, and Brian Shlonsky, who recently joined the team as Communications and Social Media Manager, are here year-round to help the media find and tell unique Derby stories and share the Museum’s mission with guests and the public. From coordinating interviews to cultivating photo and video opportunities, providing access to the Museum and our archives, and helping you fact-check Derby history – we’d love to hear from you! Please reach out to khelmer@derbymuseum.org or bshlonsky@derbymuseum.org if you have a story or project where we can collaborate. Cheers to the Museum’s 40th anniversary and Derby 151!

We're thrilled to share the news that KDM's Executive Vice President has been named to the 2024 Louisville Business First Forty Under 40 class! Congratulations, Katie Fussenegger CTA, CTIS, TMP! Thank you for your wisdom, guidance, dedication, and constant support of the museum's mission. And a huge congratulations to all the honorees! You can read about the entire class here: https://lnkd.in/gEkUEVts

More Derby 75 information on why we created it and where you can get it. Thanks to the James Graham Brown Foundation, this amazingly designed publication is only $35! https://lnkd.in/dBYUwSzw

The minute you walk into our annual Ball & Backstretch Party…you’re a VIP 🪩 Held at the illustrious First Turn Club at Churchill Downs, get ready for a night of elegance, fun, and unforgettable moments! 🥂 Are you ready for the VIP treatment? Grab your tickets today! Sales end TOMORROW at noon🍾 🎟️ >> https://bit.ly/411FUIK #RaceTo150 #KyDerby #Derby150 #DerbyFashion #Gala #Fashion
